alert.note: Alert for Orange (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 1:31PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Calcasieu Parish in southwestern Louisiana and northeastern Orange Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 131 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mauriceville, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orange, Vidor, West Orange, Vinton, Mauriceville, Pinehurst and Toomey. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 880 and 866. Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 7. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
